details.description: See maps and analyse data about environmental information in your area, including landfill, river quality, air pollution
details.introduction: Choose a topic (eg landfill, air pollution, river quality) and enter your postcode to see it on a map in your area. You can also look up data to get detailed local environmental information (eg pollution levels).
expectations: Available in England and Wales only

tags.title: Safety and the environment in your community

details.description: Includes waste, rubbish and recycling, noise pollution and local emergencies
Your legal obligations and rights when renting, buying or owning a home, plus information about Council Tax, what to do if you're homeless and where to get help if you have a housing dispute.
Finding a volunteer placement, rights of volunteers, pay, expenses, age limits and claiming benefits while volunteering

related.title: Check the quality of your drinking water

details.description: Your tap water should be clear and bright - water quality advice, reporting problems, how to complain

related.title: Noise from roads, trains or planes

details.description: Legal noise limits for on and off-road vehicles, and what to do if you're affected by road, rail or aircraft noise
Find out if your council collects recycling, how to recycle household waste such as mobile phones, computers, packaging and green waste
